description: Welcome to The Rockwoods by Anthem Properties—Fleetwood’s most sought-after community! This 4 BED + 3 BATH townhome combines modern style with functional design, featuring nearly 10’ ceilings, a chef-inspired kitchen with granite counters, s/s appliances, and an oversized island perfect for entertaining. The serene primary suite offers a relaxing retreat, while the versatile tandem garage provides added space and convenience. Residents enjoy access to an exclusive clubhouse with a full gym, yoga studio, and social lounge. Ideally located just minutes from Frost Road Elementary, Surrey Christian School, parks, shopping, and the upcoming SkyTrain extension—this home truly has it all!
